body_html: We have a tool to help rewrite old checkpoints here. The top of the script has instructions on how to convert your old RNN checkpoints to a format that will work with TF 1.3+.
body_text: We have a tool to help rewrite old checkpoints here.  The top of the script has instructions on how to convert your old RNN checkpoints to a format that will work with TF 1.3+.
body: We have a tool to help rewrite old checkpoints [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/rnn/python/tools/checkpoint_convert.py).  The top of the script has instructions on how to convert your old RNN checkpoints to a format that will work with TF 1.3+.
